name: JunkBox
short_description:
Junkbox uses the power of big data analytics to scour your junkbox account for whatever you may need.  Going for coffee, find that hidden coupon using Junkbox's simple to use analytic tools.  Heading to dinner, find that special deal hidden in thousands of emails using Junkbox Analytics.

The expectation is that through the creation of a Junkbox grass roots effort, that we can create a central hub that will draw the deal makers directly to the consumer, cutting out the need for high margin middlemen such as Groupon or Living Social.
summary: JunkBox - open source project to help you make since of your junk.
